translated: Dhāraṇī Method of the Goddess Ratnagarbha

original: 爾時三十三天主摩醯首羅天王。共諸天女
analyzed: 爾時三十三天主摩醯首羅天王。共諸天女
translated: At that time, the lord of the thirty-three heavens, the king of Maheśvara, together with the celestial maidens,

original: 眾讚寶藏天王名吒羅佉。有大威德色力無
analyzed: 眾讚寶藏天王名吒羅佉。有大威德色力無
translated: praised the name of the king of Ratnagarbha, who had great majestic virtue and incomparable color and strength,
and was able to perform extraordinary deeds in the world.
He could cause the heavens to turn, the earth to shake, the mountains to tilt, and the seas to overturn.
He was victorious in battle, and his intentions were accomplished.
His wealth, silk, gold, and treasures were piled up like mountains.
He enjoyed worldly pleasures.
He then spoke the mantra, saying:

original: 唵吒羅佉吒羅佉毘多羅儞莎嚩訶若欲受持此法。
analyzed: 唵吒羅佉吒羅佉毘多羅儞莎嚩訶若欲受持此法。
translated: Oṃ, Ratnakhāṭa Ratnakhāṭa, Vidārāṇi, svāhā. If one wishes to uphold this method,
first draw the form of a celestial maiden.

original: 泥檀法五月五日前七日。
analyzed: 泥檀法五月五日前七日。
translated: According to the method of clay, before the fifth day of the fifth month, for seven days,
eat porridge and observe the long fast.
The place where one wishes to go must be clean.

original: 凡行此法天女不喚自來。
analyzed: 凡行此法天女不喚自來。
translated: In general, when practicing this method, the celestial maiden will come by herself even if not summoned.
However, one must think of using it to express sincerity.

original: 此法必須五月五日夜受持即果成就。
analyzed: 此法必須五月五日夜受持即果成就。
translated: This method must be upheld on the night of the fifth day of the fifth month, and then the results will be accomplished.
On the night of the fifth day of the fifth month,

original: 注想思存換換誦呪一千八遍。
analyzed: 注想思存換換誦呪一千八遍。
translated: concentrate your thoughts and recite the mantra one thousand and eight times.
Do not rush.
By the third watch, your mind will be drowsy as if sleeping.

original: 天女使諸女來令相試弄。
analyzed: 天女使諸女來令相試弄。
translated: The heavenly maiden will send various women to come and test you.
Do not speak with them.
By the second time,

original: 其天女吒羅佉自來相見。
analyzed: 其天女吒羅佉自來相見。
translated: the heavenly maiden Tārā will come herself to meet you.
The practitioner should not go to her.
Then kneel, join palms, bow twice,
and ask her what she needs.
The practitioner should answer her words.
Request good medicine, longevity, immortality, and spiritual powers.
The affairs and emotions of the world.
Serve her for the rest of your life.
The heavenly maiden wishes to be your wife.
When the heavenly maiden hears this, she is overjoyed.
That night, she will grant all your wishes and have intercourse with you.
If you wish to make her your sister,

original: 於事必須分明勿生狐疑。
analyzed: 於事必須分明勿生狐疑。
translated: you must be clear about the matter and do not give rise to doubt.

original: 其壇法二肘半量用牛糞泥地。
analyzed: 其壇法二肘半量用牛糞泥地。
translated: The altar method is two cubits and a half in size, using cow dung to smear the ground.
Further, smear the ground with fragrant mud.

original: 五色彩畫又五色綵各二尺一寸。
analyzed: 五色彩畫又五色綵各二尺一寸。
translated: Five-colored threads, each two chi and one cun long.
Place the heavenly maiden's seat inside the altar.
Ghee, milk, etc., and fruits, each one plate.
Five-colored flower cakes, each five pieces.

original: 已雜栗麥燒花隨意供養。
analyzed: 已雜栗麥燒花隨意供養。
translated: Burned flowers as desired for offerings.

original: 其畫像法天女身長二尺五寸。
analyzed: 其畫像法天女身長二尺五寸。
translated: The method of drawing the image, the heavenly maiden's body is two chi and five cun long.

original: 頭作花冠所點花極妙端正。
analyzed: 頭作花冠所點花極妙端正。
translated: The head is made into a flower crown, the flowers are extremely wonderful and upright.
The body wears a purple robe, a golden belt, and black boots.
The right hand holds a lotus flower.
The left hand holds a wish-fulfilling jewel.
The heavenly maiden is upright and radiant.
No painter in the world can draw her.
One must use a good hand and not discuss the price.
At that time, the spiritual mind is free and at ease.
Wealth and rank overflow and official positions are elevated.
All misfortunes and blessings are thoroughly understood.
Nobles, humble, men, and women are all delighted.

original: 凡有所動一切鬼神皆來迎待如敬天官。
analyzed: 凡有所動一切鬼神皆來迎待如敬天官。
translated: Whenever you move, all ghosts and spirits will come to welcome you as if you were a celestial official.
They will look up at you with fear and awe, and you will attain unobstructed [powers].

original: 乃至世間好妙藝隨意而成。
analyzed: 乃至世間好妙藝隨意而成。
translated: Up to and including the world's excellent and wonderful arts, you will accomplish them as you wish.
If an evil person comes to harm you,

original: 便呼賊各皆得自縛自打。
analyzed: 便呼賊各皆得自縛自打。
translated: just call out thief and they will all be bound and beaten by themselves.

original: 言放即放世間走失死亡如驗。
analyzed: 言放即放世間走失死亡如驗。
translated: If you say release, they will be released. The lost and dead in the world will be verified.

original: 目前萬病舉意持之皆差。
analyzed: 目前萬病舉意持之皆差。
translated: In front of your eyes, all illnesses will be cured if you hold [the dhāraṇī] in mind.

original: 又八真言各須清淨沐浴著新淨衣。
analyzed: 又八真言各須清淨沐浴著新淨衣。
translated: Furthermore, for the eight true mantras, you must each bathe and purify yourself, put on new clean clothes,

original: 於佛前形像前各誦三七遍。
analyzed: 於佛前形像前各誦三七遍。
translated: and recite each one three times in front of a Buddha image.
Then perform the rites.

original: 第一真言唵興婆羅帝吒急急娑嚩二合賀第二真言唵拔羅帝吒唎摩那羅娑嚩賀第三真言唵勒叉那帝吒娑吒娑嚩二合賀第四真言唵婆婆隷若帝吒娑嚩二合賀第五真言唵勃惹羅帝吒娑嚩二合賀第六真言唵藥叉藥叉底那婆娑嚩二合賀第七真言唵遮帝毘折曳吽泮吒娑嚩二合賀第八真言唵折勒那耶利婆帝吒娑嚩二合賀以中指無名指屈。
analyzed: 第一真言唵興婆羅帝吒急急娑嚩二合賀第二真言唵拔羅帝吒唎摩那羅娑嚩賀第三真言唵勒叉那帝吒娑吒娑嚩二合賀第四真言唵婆婆隷若帝吒娑嚩二合賀第五真言唵勃惹羅帝吒娑嚩二合賀第六真言唵藥叉藥叉底那婆娑嚩二合賀第七真言唵遮帝毘折曳吽泮吒娑嚩二合賀第八真言唵折勒那耶利婆帝吒娑嚩二合賀以中指無名指屈。
translated: The first mantra is Om Xingboluo Di Zhe Ji Ji Svaha. The second mantra is Om Baluo Di Zhe Limona Svaha. The third mantra is Om Luocha Na Di Zhe Sha Sha Svaha. The fourth mantra is Om Boliya Di Zhe Svaha. The fifth mantra is Om Bojialuo Di Zhe Svaha. The sixth mantra is Om Yacha Yacha Dhinabasha Svaha. The seventh mantra is Om Zhe Di Pi She Ye Hunkang Zhe Svaha. The eighth mantra is Om Sheluona Yeli Bo Di Zhe Svaha. Bend the middle finger and ring finger,
and press the fingernails with the thumb.
Stretch out the index finger and little finger, and place them on the heart.
Hold the rosary with the right hand and recite the mantra.
This is called the Jade Ring Seal.
The method of the Goddess of the Treasure Treasury is finished.
